name: The Asylum (JANKOGAMES)
description:
The Asylum is a horror game where it takes you into a small story. You play as Alan, a detective looking for his partner Joe, who also went searching for the missing bodies of the Elebergu Asylum. Your goal is to find Joe, find the bodies, and report back to the office. 

Credits:

-Jorston, Director of Janko Games, Co-Director of Lamb45 Studs.

-LambChop45, Director and Founder of Lamb45 Studs.
